summary: Auleric is a powerful destruction mage who lives at the College of Winterhold.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://25.media.tumblr.com/b012d13e2a3aec29c43a8d1fe1801e04/tumblr_mjh27oSugq1r2xmg4o1_1280.jpg[/img][/center]

Auleric is a Nord, male, mage-class follower who lives at the College of Winterhold. From 9-5 daily you can find him studying in the Arcaneum, and he spends his evenings on the top floor of the Hall of Attainment. He is a powerful destruction mage and will usually choose to fight with magic over any weapons you might give him. He also has a few stealth perks, so he won't set off any floor-based traps and should be less likely to give sneaky players away. He is also a marriage candidate.

Auleric requires no other mods for installation. You can use whichever texture and body replacers you like.

[b]Auleric is packaged with high-definition warpaint created by Geonox. If you like what you see, please download and endorse [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4283]High Res Warpaint and Dirtmaps for Men by Geonox[/url].[/b]

There is one known bug with this mod. If your character is the Archmage, Auleric may occasionally greet you with "What can I do for you, Archmage?" However, his voice has no recording for this line, so you'll only see a subtitle. This will only happen if you talk to Auleric while he's not a current follower, so it shouldn't be too disruptive.

There are 2 versions of this mod. The first version has him wearing a standard college robe. The "optional" version has him wearing no equipment whatsoever, so that you can equip him with whatever robes and clothing you like. Unfortunately, this means when you first meet him he'll be wandering around the college in his underwear (or naked, depending on the body mods you have installed). If you are running UFO, you will not need the "optional" version as I think you can change your character's equipment however you like.

Auleric's face is also available as a preset in my mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15641]Better Male Presets[/url].

[center][img]http://24.media.tumblr.com/0f27ce1b3a493125bc208a640c59806d/tumblr_mmvc2fD0LC1r2xmg4o1_1280.jpg[/img]
Image courtesy [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1409267/]greyblood[/url][/center]

Thank you to:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/30377]Geonox[/url], for the HD warpaint texture.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1801645]shadowtigers[/url], for testing and letting me cannibalize your characters' AI for my own purposes.
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2753566]foretrenty[/url], for making the Skyrim NPC Editor.

Please check out the following mods that made this mod and my screenshots possible:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32308]Gareth Freyrik - Nord Companion of Jorrvaskr Follower by shadowtigers[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4283]High Res Warpaint and Dirtmaps for Men by Geonox[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4554]Skyrim NPC Editor 0_75_1 by foretrenty[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25846]TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim by asianboy345[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4023]Revealing Mageapprentice Robes by aoki[/url] (18+)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33124]Better males - Beautiful nudes and faces - New hairstyles by Chris57 and FavoredSoul[/url] (18+)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15105]Sharpshooter's Extreme Graphics Vision ENB by Sharpshooter8[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/28363]Beards by Hvergelmir[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13722]The Eyes Of Beauty by Gabriel Mailhot[/url]

I love screenshots and would love any you can submit. And check out my other mods [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15641]Better Male Presets[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31239]Auveren - Wood Elf Male Follower - and Preset[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31210]Vaendral - Imperial Male Follower[/url], [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15589]Stenvar Revamped[/url], and [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8007]Sven Revamped[/url] if you like my work. (And a comment/endorsement wouldn't hurt either <3).

Thank you for visiting!

[center][img]http://25.media.tumblr.com/08884ad1f108bcee5c37a8e0d9a43827/tumblr_mjifv84rK01r2xmg4o1_1280.jpg[/img]
Image courtesy [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1801645]shadowtigers[/url]
